name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Drop 8 USA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for young athletes seeking superior performance on the field. With its USA Baseball Certification and a balanced swing feel, this bat is designed for optimal play. The one-piece alloy construction, featuring the innovative AZR Alloy, ensures exceptional plate performance and responsiveness. Its ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design expand the sweet spot, while the AV3 Vibration Dampener absorbs vibrations for enhanced comfort. The bat's vibrant red, black, and sky blue colorway, coupled with a custom knob design and soft touch grip, provide both style and control for players aiming for excellence. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
